title: Google and the Commonwealth of Virginia are offering AI training scholarships to Virginians

html:
We’ve partnered with Virginia Works to offer Google Career Certificates and AI course scholarships to Virginians.

These scholarships cover enrollment in:

  • Google AI and Prompting Essentials courses, foundational offerings that help working-age Virginians learn to use AI tools for work and life. They take a few hours to complete on average.
  • Google Career Certificates provide job-ready training in high-growth fields like cybersecurity, data analytics and project management — no previous experience required. Graduates gain access to our employer consortium of more than 150 companies — including Accenture, Hilton and Google. More than 70% of Google Career Certificates graduates report a positive career outcome like a new job, promotion or raise within six months of completing the program, which itself typically takes three to six months of part-time flexible study to complete.

Get started learning AI skills at virginiahasjobs.com/ai.
